champ.champInfo:
Organizing committee and judges:

  • Chief judge of the competition — Serhiy Bronistovsky, 6th dan (Kyiv)
  • Chairman of the organizing committee — Oleksandr Sushko, 2nd dan (Kyiv), 050-843-06-24
  • Technical support — Ihor Tatarchenko (Lviv)

Venue of the competition: Kyiv, str. Knyazhy Zaton, 17V

The competition will be held in Kyiv on May 19, 2024.

ADDITIONAL CONDITIONS FOR PARTICIPATION IN COMPETITIONS.

  • participants born in 2006-2019 with qualifications 0-9 kyu are divided into categories of 4 participants (series B)
  • participants born in 2006-2019 with a qualification of 8-7 kyu are divided into categories of 4 participants (B1 series)
  • participants born in 2006-2015 with a qualification of 6 kyu and adults (series A) compete according to the Olympic system with execution of kata at the choice of the judge (qualifying rounds) and at their own choice (from the 1/4 finals)

COLORS

  • Dogi Requirements: Dogi jackets must have the kanji emblems "kyokushinkai" or "shin-kyokushinkai" on the left side of the sternum. Emblems on the jacket sleeves are allowed (state flag, WKO, UFKK (NFKKU), club emblems, etc.)
  • Dogi pants may contain the kanji emblems "kyokushinkai" or "shin-kyokushinkai", the logo "OSU!", other inscriptions and memorial emblems
  • All other emblems, logos, inscriptions, etc. are prohibited. Therefore, they must be removed from the dog's jacket or pants or covered in advance with a tightly sewn white cloth
Qualification of participants 0-9 kyu (categories of 4 participants). The match for the 3rd place is present.

R.N. Level Qualifiers from 1/4
Adults 1 Yantsu, Tsuki no Kata, Heksai dai, Saiha, Hekusai sho Haryu, Seichin, Kanku, Seipai, Sushiho
2006-2007 2 yantsu, tsuki No kata, Hekusai dai yantsu, tsuki no kata, hekusai dai, saiha, hekusai sho

Personal choice kata in the quarter-finals, semi-finals, 3rd place match and final must be different.

Competition conditions

Competitions are held in accordance with the "Kyokushinkai Karate Competition Rules" in force in Ukraine

Awards

  • Athletes who took 1-3 places are awarded diplomas of the respective degrees, medals and cups

Registration

Registration for participation in the competition takes place through a personal account until May 14, 2024.

Application letter for participation in the established form, other necessary documents and insurance poles are submitted to the mandate commission during the medical commission and weighing of the participants. Teams that have confirmed their participation within the set deadline are admitted to the competition
